summary.p: 10 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 37; Qurʾānic Text: Q 7:133-7:164; 7 lines per page; Dimensions: 217 x 160mm; Script style: kūfī D.I.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
10 fol. 160×217 mm (1.36). Support: parchment of average thickness, semitransparent, of yellowish color, kind of “dull”. Writing material: light brown ink.
Collation: one quire outer, the inner, middle and outer sheets are bifolia, the rest are singletons with a stub.
I: H1F H2F S H3F H4F S H5F / F6H F7H S F8H F9H S F10H;
Text layout: 88×160 mm (1.8/2.0?), 7 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: →D I. Diacritics: diagonal dashes of the same color as the main text. Vocalization: large dots in brown or dark brown glossy ink.

Verse markers: for individual verses – rosettes in gold and ink (type 3.1.2); for groups of five verses – medallions in the text line or on the margins in gold and ink (type 1.A.I) with the inscribed word خمس ; for groups of ten verses – medallions on the margins (type 2.A.II) in gold and colors with the inscribed numbers of verses (مائة اربعون – fol. 2v, مائة خمسون – fol. 6r, مائة ستون – fol. 10r).
Inscriptions: numbers of verses are inscribed in pencil with Arabic numerals on the margins.
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures of the fold; on the outer fold of the outer bifolium there are traces of brown substance (glue?).
Defects: stains and traces of moisture, especially on fol. 10; lower margins of fol. 7–10 damaged.

Attached materials: old wrapping (fol. I) consisting of a narrow strip of paper inscribed with letters “C.G.”, brief description of the manuscript in French in brown ink – “10 f. 7 lig. \\ S. VII. v. 130 à 164” and old accession number in red pencil “B. 15”.
Old accession numbers: C.G. (on the wrapping); B. 15 (on the wrapping and according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–10v. Surah 7, verses 130(133) – 164(164). Incipit: [الطوفانَ] والجرّاد . Explicit: لم تعظون [قومًا] ."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
